name: Great Abortion Clinic
description:
Why bother with boring, conventional abortions, if you can do'em while having fun?

Founders of Great Abortion Clinic came up with a great idea - they organized a battle arena, where all of the unhappily loaded women can free themselves in a brutal, but incredibly fun competition. While riding hospital beds, patients shoot at each other with their not-so-wanted-inside-parasites while trying to evade other's babies - so they can live long enough to be happy with not having children.

Will you be the best mama and beat your opponents with dead fetuses? Try it!
